titles.title: 492 Lord Jesus Are We One With Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord Jesus are we one with Thee
O height O depth of love
Thou one with us on Calvary
We one with Thee above

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Such was Thy grace that for our sake
Thou didst from heaven come down
With us of flesh and blood partake
In all our misery one

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Our sins our guilt in love Divine
Confessed and borne by Thee
The gall the curse the wrath were Thine
To set Thy members free

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ascended now in glory bright
Head of the Chruch Thou art
Nor life nor death nor depth nor height
Thy saints and Thee can part

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Oh teach us Lord to know and own
This wonderous mystery
That Thou in heaven with us art one
And we are one with Thee

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Soon soon shall come that glorious day
When seated on Thy throne
Thou shalt to wondering worlds display
That Thou with us art one
